scripts.server-migrate-reset-dev: NODE_ENV=dev cd backend/apollo-server-graphql-prisma && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.server-migrate-reset-prod: NODE_ENV=prod cd backend/apollo-server-graphql-prisma && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.server-start-prod: NODE_ENV=prod cd backend/apollo-server-graphql-prisma && npm run start
scripts.server-start-dev: NODE_ENV=dev cd backend/apollo-server-graphql-prisma && npm run dev
scripts.react-build-serve: cd frontend/react-graphql-apollo && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.react-start-prod: cd frontend/react-graphql-apollo && npm run build && (cd ../../backend/apollo-server-graphql-prisma && npm run start)
